title: America’s Rising Classics Star Luke Lamperti Back After Knee Flareup Delayed Season Debut
content:
Exclusive: American rising star returns to Europe for the spring classics after a delayed start to his 2025 season: 'I want to convert top-10s into podiums and wins.'

Read the full article at America’s Rising Classics Star Luke Lamperti Back After Knee Flareup Delayed Season Debut on Velo.
author: ahood
